mapper.sql: quality_plan_class_id AS "qualityPlanClassId", quality_plan_id AS "qualityPlanId", quality_check_classification_id AS "qualityCheckClassificationId", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser", display AS "display", deptId AS "deptId", name AS "name"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_erp_quality_class where 1 = 1
and quality_plan_class_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.qualityPlanClassId},'%')
and quality_plan_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.qualityPlanId},'%')
and quality_check_classification_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.qualityCheckClassificationId},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
and name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.name},'%')
